head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GREENE, SIDNEY R.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GREENE, SIDNEY R.

block.p: GREENE-Sidney R. On S ept. 7, 2000. Beloved husband of Lola Greene. Dear father of Mindy Blum and Shari Greene. Cherished grandfather of Noah and Samuel. Father-in-law of Mitchell Blum. Dear brother of Yale Greenberg. Services Sunday, September 10, 11:30 AM at ''The Riverside'', 76 Street and Amsterdam Avenue.

GREENE-Sidney R. On S ept. 7, 2000. Beloved husband of Lola Greene. Dear father of Mindy Blum and Shari Greene. Cherished grandfather of Noah and Samuel. Father-in-law of Mitchell Blum. Dear brother of Yale Greenberg. Services Sunday, September 10, 11:30 AM at ''The Riverside'', 76 Street and Amsterdam Avenue.
